page.title: 09SELBY RAILWAY STATION
page.content: The{Railway Station}was built over 100 years ago. It was the main line for 60 years until a new one was built. There are 19{level crossings}in the Selby District area. About 60 years ago the{ {Flying Scotsman}came into the station so fast that it killed a workman. 18 people work in{Selby Station.}They used to work 8 hours a day but they are now working 12 because they are short of staff. We went onto the{swing {bridge}that crosses the river. We were told that we were the first children to go over it. The bridge is very dangerous because if you had loose clothing on (like dresses or skirts etc.) and the train caught your clothes you would be dragged along and killed. There is a box which works the bridge. The people who work it work 24 hours a day every day in shifts (apart from Xmas.)
